text: Hannah Ama Nyarko (born 25 July 1964) is a Ghanaian diplomat. She is the ambassador of Ghana to Israel. She studied at the University of Ghana gaining a first and masters degree. In January 1992, she joined the foreign service. She promoted trade between Ghana and Israel. == References == == Other websites == * Ghana Israel Alliance 2019 * PROFILE OF THE AMBASSADOR Embassy Of The Republic of Ghana, Israel Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian diplomats Category:Ambassadors to Israel
title: Hannah Ama Nyarko
